member.name: M:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.TatClient.CancelInvocation(TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.CancelInvocationRequest)
member.summary:
This API is used to cancel the command executed on one or more CVM instances.
* If the command has not been delivered to the TAT agent, the task status is `PENDING`, `DELIVERING`, or `DELIVER_DELAYED`, and will be `CANCELLED` after the command is canceled. * If the command has been delivered to the TAT agent, the task status is `RUNNING`, and will be `TERMINATED` after the command is canceled.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.TatClient.CancelInvocationSync(TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.CancelInvocationRequest)
member.summary:
This API is used to cancel the command executed on one or more CVM instances.
* If the command has not been delivered to the TAT agent, the task status is `PENDING`, `DELIVERING`, or `DELIVER_DELAYED`, and will be `CANCELLED` after the command is canceled. * If the command has been delivered to the TAT agent, the task status is `RUNNING`, and will be `TERMINATED` after the command is canceled.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.TatClient.InvokeCommand(TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.InvokeCommandRequest)
member.summary:
This API is used to trigger a command on the specified instance and returns the execution activity ID (inv-xxxxxxxx) on success. Each execution activity has one or more execution tasks (invt-xxxxxxxx) and each execution task indicates an execution record on a CVM or Lighthouse instance.
* If the agent is not installed on the instance or is offline, an error is returned. * If the command type is not supported by the agent runtime environment, an error is returned. * The specified instance needs to be in a VPC network. * The specified instance needs to be in the RUNNING status. * Only one type of instances (CVM or Lighthouse) can be specified in a single request.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.TatClient.InvokeCommandSync(TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.InvokeCommandRequest)
member.summary:
This API is used to trigger a command on the specified instance and returns the execution activity ID (inv-xxxxxxxx) on success. Each execution activity has one or more execution tasks (invt-xxxxxxxx) and each execution task indicates an execution record on a CVM or Lighthouse instance.
* If the agent is not installed on the instance or is offline, an error is returned. * If the command type is not supported by the agent runtime environment, an error is returned. * The specified instance needs to be in a VPC network. * The specified instance needs to be in the RUNNING status. * Only one type of instances (CVM or Lighthouse) can be specified in a single request.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.TatClient.RunCommand(TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.RunCommandRequest)
member.summary:
This API is used to execute a command and returns the execution activity ID (inv-xxxxxxxx) on success. Each execution has one or more execution tasks (invt-xxxxxxxx) and each execution task indicates an execution record on a CVM or Lighthouse instance.
* If the agent is not installed on the instance or is offline, an error is returned. * If the command type is not supported by the agent runtime environment, an error is returned. * The specified instance needs to be in a VPC network. * The specified instance needs to be in the `RUNNING` status. * Only one type of instances (CVM or Lighthouse) can be specified in a single request.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.TatClient.RunCommandSync(TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.RunCommandRequest)
member.summary:
This API is used to execute a command and returns the execution activity ID (inv-xxxxxxxx) on success. Each execution has one or more execution tasks (invt-xxxxxxxx) and each execution task indicates an execution record on a CVM or Lighthouse instance.
* If the agent is not installed on the instance or is offline, an error is returned. * If the command type is not supported by the agent runtime environment, an error is returned. * The specified instance needs to be in a VPC network. * The specified instance needs to be in the `RUNNING` status. * Only one type of instances (CVM or Lighthouse) can be specified in a single request.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.CreateCommandRequest.CommandName
member.summary: Command name. The name can be up to 60 bytes, and contain [a-z], [A-Z], [0-9] and [_-.].

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.CreateCommandRequest.Content
member.summary: Base64-encoded command. The maximum length is 64 KB.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.CreateCommandRequest.Description
member.summary: Command description. The maximum length is 120 characters.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.CreateCommandRequest.CommandType
member.summary: Command type. `SHELL` and `POWERSHELL` are supported. The default value is `SHELL`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.CreateCommandRequest.WorkingDirectory
member.summary: Command execution path. The default value is /root for `SHELL` commands and C:\Program Files\qcloud\tat_agent\workdir for `POWERSHELL` commands.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.CreateCommandRequest.Timeout
member.summary: Command timeout period. Default value: 60 seconds. Value range: [1, 86400].

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.CreateCommandRequest.EnableParameter
member.summary: Whether to enable the custom parameter feature. This cannot be modified once created. Default value: `false`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.CreateCommandRequest.DefaultParameters
member.summary: The default value of the custom parameter value when it is enabled. The field type is JSON encoded string. For example, {\"varA\": \"222\"}. `key` is the name of the custom parameter and `value` is the default value. Both `key` and `value` are strings. If no parameter value is provided in the `InvokeCommand` API, the default value is used. Up to 20 custom parameters are supported. The name of the custom parameter cannot exceed 64 characters and can contain [a-z], [A-Z], [0-9] and [-_].

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.CreateCommandRequest.Tags
member.summary: Tags bound to the command. At most 10 tags are allowed.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.CreateCommandRequest.Username
member.summary: The username used to execute the command on the CVM or Lighthouse instance. The principle of least privilege is the best practice for permission management. We recommend you execute TAT commands as a general user. By default, the root user is used to execute commands on Linux and the System user is used on Windows.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.CreateCommandRequest.OutputCOSBucketUrl
member.summary: The COS bucket URL for uploading logs. The URL must start with `https`, such as `https://BucketName-123454321.cos.ap-beijing.myqcloud.com`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.CreateCommandRequest.OutputCOSKeyPrefix
member.summary: The COS bucket directory where the logs are saved. Check below for the rules of the directory name. 1. It must be a combination of number, letters, and visible characters. Up to 60 characters are allowed. 2. Use a slash (/) to create a subdirectory. 3. Consecutive dots (.) and slashes (/) are not allowed. It can not start with a slash (/).

member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.InvokeCommandRequest.CommandId
member.summary: ID of the command to be triggered.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.InvokeCommandRequest.InstanceIds
member.summary: IDs of instances about to execute commands. At most 100 IDs are allowed.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.InvokeCommandRequest.Parameters
member.summary: Custom parameters of the command. The field type is JSON encoded string. For example, {\"varA\": \"222\"}. `key` is the name of the custom parameter and `value` is the default value. Both `key` and `value` are strings. If no parameter value is provided, the DefaultParameters of the command is used. Up to 20 custom parameters are supported. The name of the custom parameter cannot exceed 64 characters and can contain [a-z], [A-Z], [0-9] and [-_].

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.InvokeCommandRequest.Username
member.summary: The username used to execute the command on the CVM or Lighthouse instance. The principle of the least privilege is the best practice for permission management. We recommend you execute TAT commands as a general user. If this is not specified, the Username of the command is used by default.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.InvokeCommandRequest.WorkingDirectory
member.summary: Execution path of the command. The WorkingDirectory of the command is used by default.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.InvokeCommandRequest.Timeout
member.summary: Command timeout period. Value range: [1, 86400]. The Timeout of the command is used by default.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.InvokeCommandRequest.OutputCOSBucketUrl
member.summary: The COS bucket URL for uploading logs. The URL must start with `https`, such as `https://BucketName-123454321.cos.ap-beijing.myqcloud.com`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.InvokeCommandRequest.OutputCOSKeyPrefix
member.summary: The COS bucket directory where the logs are saved. Check below for the rules of the directory name. 1. It must be a combination of number, letters, and visible characters. Up to 60 characters are allowed. 2. Use a slash (/) to create a subdirectory. 3. ".." can not be used as the folder name. It cannot start with a slash (/), and cannot contain consecutive slashes.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.InvokeCommandRequest.ToMap(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.String)
member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.

member.summary: Command ID.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.ModifyCommandRequest.CommandName
member.summary: Command name. The name can be up to 60 bytes, and contain [a-z], [A-Z], [0-9] and [_-.].

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.ModifyCommandRequest.Description
member.summary: Command description. The maximum length is 120 characters.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.ModifyCommandRequest.Content
member.summary: Base64-encoded command. The maximum length is 64 KB.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.ModifyCommandRequest.CommandType
member.summary: Command type. `SHELL` and `POWERSHELL` are supported.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.ModifyCommandRequest.WorkingDirectory
member.summary: Command execution path.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.ModifyCommandRequest.Timeout
member.summary: Command timeout period. Value range: [1, 86400].

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.ModifyCommandRequest.DefaultParameters
member.summary: The default value of the custom parameter value when it is enabled. The field type is JSON encoded string. For example, {\"varA\": \"222\"}. All parameters are overwritten. All default values are required for modification. Modification is only allowed when `EnableParameter` is `true`. `key` is the name of the custom parameter and `value` is the default value. Both `key` and `value` are strings. Up to 20 custom parameters are supported. The name of the custom parameter cannot exceed 64 characters and can contain [a-z], [A-Z], [0-9] and [-_].

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.ModifyCommandRequest.Username
member.summary: The username used to execute the command on the CVM or Lighthouse instance. The principle of least privilege is the best practice for permission management. We recommend you execute TAT commands as a general user.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.ModifyCommandRequest.OutputCOSBucketUrl
member.summary: The COS bucket URL for uploading logs. The URL must start with `https`, such as `https://BucketName-123454321.cos.ap-beijing.myqcloud.com`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.ModifyCommandRequest.OutputCOSKeyPrefix
member.summary: The COS bucket directory where the logs are saved. Check below for the rules of the directory name. 1. It must be a combination of number, letters, and visible characters. Up to 60 characters are allowed. 2. Use a slash (/) to create a subdirectory. 3. ".." can not be used as the folder name. It cannot start with a slash (/), and cannot contain consecutive slashes.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.PreviewReplacedCommandContentRequest.Parameters
member.summary: Custom parameters for the preview. The field type is JSON encoded string. For example, {\"varA\": \"222\"}. `key` is the name of the custom parameter and "value" is its specified value. Both "key" and "value" are strings. At most 20 custom parameters are supported. The name of the custom parameter cannot exceed 64 characters and can only contain [a-z], [A-Z], [0-9], [-_]. This parameter can be left empty if DefaultParameters is set for the previewed CommandId.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.PreviewReplacedCommandContentRequest.CommandId
member.summary: The command to be previewed. If DefaultParameters is set, it is combined with Parameters and Parameters takes priority. `CommandId` or `Content` must be specified.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.PreviewReplacedCommandContentRequest.Content
member.summary: Base64-encoded command to be previewed. The maximum length is 64 KB. CommandId or Content must be specified.

member.summary: Region status. `AVAILABLE` indicates the region is available.

member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.RunCommandRequest.Content
member.summary: Base64-encoded command. The maximum length is 64 KB.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.RunCommandRequest.CommandName
member.summary: Command name. The name can be up to 60 bytes, and contain [a-z], [A-Z], [0-9] and [_-.].

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.RunCommandRequest.Description
member.summary: Command description. The maximum length is 120 characters.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.RunCommandRequest.CommandType
member.summary: Command type. `SHELL` and `POWERSHELL` are supported. The default value is `SHELL`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.RunCommandRequest.WorkingDirectory
member.summary: Command execution path. The default value is /root for `SHELL` commands and C:\Program Files\qcloud\tat_agent\workdir for `POWERSHELL` commands.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.RunCommandRequest.Timeout
member.summary: Command timeout period. Default value: 60 seconds. Value range: [1, 86400].

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.RunCommandRequest.EnableParameter
member.summary: Whether to enable the custom parameter feature. This cannot be modified once created. Default value: `false`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.RunCommandRequest.DefaultParameters
member.summary: The default value of the custom parameter value when it is enabled. The field type is JSON encoded string. For example, {\"varA\": \"222\"}. `key` is the name of the custom parameter and `value` is the default value. Both `key` and `value` are strings. If Parameters is not provided, the default values specified here are used. Up to 20 custom parameters are supported. The name of the custom parameter cannot exceed 64 characters and can contain [a-z], [A-Z], [0-9] and [-_].

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.RunCommandRequest.Parameters
member.summary: Custom parameters of `Command`. The field type is JSON encoded string. For example, {\"varA\": \"222\"}. `key` is the name of the custom parameter and `value` is the default value. Both `key` and `value` are strings. If no parameter value is provided, the `DefaultParameters` is used. Up to 20 custom parameters are supported. The name of the custom parameter cannot exceed 64 characters and can contain [a-z], [A-Z], [0-9] and [-_].

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.RunCommandRequest.Tags
member.summary: The tags of the command. It is available when `SaveCommand` is `True`. A maximum of 10 tags are allowed.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.RunCommandRequest.Username
member.summary: The username used to execute the command on the CVM or Lighthouse instance. The principle of least privilege is the best practice for permission management. We recommend you execute TAT commands as a general user. By default, the user `root` is used to execute commands on Linux and the user `System` is used on Windows.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.RunCommandRequest.OutputCOSBucketUrl
member.summary: The COS bucket URL for uploading logs. The URL must start with `https`, such as `https://BucketName-123454321.cos.ap-beijing.myqcloud.com`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.RunCommandRequest.OutputCOSKeyPrefix
member.summary: The COS bucket directory where the logs are saved. Check below for the rules of the directory name. 1. It must be a combination of number, letters, and visible characters. Up to 60 characters are allowed. 2. Use a slash (/) to create a subdirectory. 3. ".." can not be used as the folder name. It cannot start with a slash (/), and cannot contain consecutive slashes.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.RunCommandRequest.ToMap(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.String)
member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.RunCommandResponse.InvocationId
member.summary: Execution activity ID.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.RunCommandResponse.RequestId
member.summary: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.ScheduleSettings.Recurrence
member.summary: Trigger the crontab expression. This field is required if `Policy` is `RECURRENCE`. The crontab expression is parsed in UTC+8.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tat.V20201028.Models.ScheduleSettings.InvokeTime
member.summary: The next execution time of the invoker. This field is required if `Policy` is `ONCE`.
